actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny an exemption from tax to any otherwise tax-exempt organization which discriminates in certain cases against blind individuals.

summary.text: Denies the exemption from taxation under the Internal Revenue Code to any otherwise tax exempt organization which discriminates against blind individuals with respect to employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny an exemption from tax to any otherwise tax-exempt organization which discriminates in certain cases against blind individuals.
